Structs/FileURLPassthroughResponseSerial.name: MissingURLError
Structs/FileURLPassthroughResponseSerial.abstract: Error returned when received fileURL is nil

Structs/TRONDownloadResponseSerializer.h.name: init(closure:)
Structs/TRONDownloadResponseSerializer.h.abstract: Creates response serializer from passed serialization closure

Structs/TRONDataResponseSerializer.html#.name: init(closure:)
Structs/TRONDataResponseSerializer.html#.abstract: Creates response serializer from passed serialization closure

Structs/DownloadError.html.name: DownloadError
Structs/DownloadError.html.abstract: Error that is created in case DownloadAPIRequest errors out, but Alamofire and URL loading system report error as nil.

Structs/TRONDataResponseSerializer.html.name: TRONDataResponseSerializer
Structs/TRONDataResponseSerializer.html.abstract: Response serializer, that wraps serialization closure to implement Alamofire.DataResponseSerializerProtocol. Is used for APIRequest and UploadAPIRequest.

Structs/TRONDownloadResponseSerializer.h.name: TRONDownloadResponseSerializer
Structs/TRONDownloadResponseSerializer.h.abstract: Response serializer, that wraps serialization closure to implement Alamofire.DownloadResponseSerializerProtocol. Is used for DownloadAPIRequest.

Structs/FileURLPassthroughResponseSerial.name: FileURLPassthroughResponseSerializer
Structs/FileURLPassthroughResponseSerial.abstract: Response serializer, that returns file URL upon successful download. Is used for DownloadAPIRequest.

Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP15.name: willSendRequest(_:)
Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP15.abstract: Notifies that request is about to be converted to Alamofire.Request

Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP24.name: willSendAlamofireRequest(_:formedFrom:)
Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP24.abstract: Notifies that request formed from tronRequest, is about to be sent.

Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP19.name: willProcessResponse(response:forRequest:formedFrom:)
Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP19.abstract: Notifies that response was received for request, formed from tronRequest.

Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP28.name: didSuccessfullyParseResponse(_:creating:forRequest:formedFrom:)
Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP28.abstract: Notifies that response for request, formed from tronRequest, was successfully parsed into result.

Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP15.name: didReceiveError(_:forResponse:request:formedFrom:)
Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP15.abstract: Notifies that request processed response and created APIError<ErrorModel> instance.

Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP23.name: didReceiveDownloadError(_:forResponse:request:formedFrom:)
Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP23.abstract: Notifies that request processed response and created APIError<ErrorModel> instance.

Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP22.name: didReceiveDataResponse(_:forRequest:formedFrom:)
Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP22.abstract: Notifies about data response that was received for request, formed from tronRequest. This method is called after parsing has completed.

Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP26.name: didReceiveDownloadResponse(_:forRequest:formedFrom:)
Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP26.abstract: Notifies about download response that was received for request, formed from tronRequest. This method is called after parsing has completed.

Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP36.name: didSuccessfullyParseDownloadResponse(_:creating:forRequest:formedFrom:)
Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:4TRON6PluginP36.abstract: Notifies that response for request, formed from tronRequest, was successfully parsed into result.

Protocols/ErrorSerializable.html.name: ErrorSerializable
Protocols/ErrorSerializable.html.abstract: Protocol used to serialize errors received from sending APIRequest or UploadAPIRequest.

Protocols/DownloadErrorSerializable.html.name: DownloadErrorSerializable
Protocols/DownloadErrorSerializable.html.abstract: Protocol used to serialize errors received from sending DownloadAPIRequest.

Protocols/TronDelegate.html.name: TronDelegate
Protocols/TronDelegate.html.abstract: Protocol used to allow APIRequest to communicate with TRON instance.

Protocols/Plugin.html.name: Plugin
Protocols/Plugin.html.abstract: Protocol that serves to provide plugin functionality to TRON.

Classes/UploadAPIRequest.html#/s:4TRON16.name: validationClosure
Classes/UploadAPIRequest.html#/s:4TRON16.abstract: Closure that is applied to request before it is sent.

Classes/UploadAPIRequest.html#/s:4TRON16.name: validation(_:)
Classes/UploadAPIRequest.html#/s:4TRON16.abstract: Sets validationClosure to validation parameter and returns configured request

Classes/UploadAPIRequest.html#/s:4TRON16.name: init(type:path:tron:responseSerializer:)
Classes/UploadAPIRequest.html#/s:4TRON16.abstract: Creates UploadAPIRequest with specified type, path and configures it with to be used with tron.

Classes/URLBuilder/Behavior.html.name: Behavior
Classes/URLBuilder/Behavior.html.abstract: Different behaviors to build URLs from base URL string and path.

Classes/URLBuilder.html#/s:4TRON10URLBui.name: init(baseURL:behavior:)
Classes/URLBuilder.html#/s:4TRON10URLBui.abstract: Initialize URL builder with Base URL String

Classes/CodableSerializer.html#/s:4TRON1.name: modelDecoder
Classes/CodableSerializer.html#/s:4TRON1.abstract: Decoder to be used while parsing model.

Classes/CodableSerializer.html#/s:4TRON1.name: init(_:modelDecoder:)
Classes/CodableSerializer.html#/s:4TRON1.abstract: Creates CodableSerializer with tron instance to send requests, and decoder to be used while parsing response.

Classes/CodableSerializer.html#/s:4TRON1.name: request(_:)
Classes/CodableSerializer.html#/s:4TRON1.abstract: Creates APIRequest with specified relative path and type RequestType.Default.

Classes/CodableSerializer.html#/s:4TRON1.name: upload(_:fromFileAt:)
Classes/CodableSerializer.html#/s:4TRON1.abstract: Creates APIRequest with specified relative path and type RequestType.UploadFromFile.

Classes/CodableSerializer.html#/s:4TRON1.name: upload(_:data:)
Classes/CodableSerializer.html#/s:4TRON1.abstract: Creates APIRequest with specified relative path and type RequestType.UploadData.

Classes/CodableSerializer.html#/s:4TRON1.name: upload(_:from:)
Classes/CodableSerializer.html#/s:4TRON1.abstract: Creates APIRequest with specified relative path and type RequestType.UploadStream.

Classes/CodableParser.html#/s:4TRON13Cod.name: serialize(request:response:data:error:)
Classes/CodableParser.html#/s:4TRON13Cod.abstract: Method used by response handlers that takes a request, response, data and error and returns a result.

Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC10urlBuilde.name: urlBuilder
Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC10urlBuilde.abstract: URL builder to be used by default in all requests. Can be overridden for specific requests.

Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC15stubbingE.name: stubbingEnabled
Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC15stubbingE.abstract: Global property, that defines whether stubbing is enabled. It is simply set on each APIRequest instance and can be reset.

Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC7pluginsSay.name: plugins
Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC7pluginsSay.abstract: Global plugins, that will receive events from all requests, created from current TRON instance.

Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC17parameter.name: parameterEncoding
Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC17parameter.abstract: Default parameter encoding, that will be set on all APIRequests. Can be overrided by setting new value on APIRequest.parameterEncoding property.

Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC19resultDel.name: resultDeliveryQueue
Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC19resultDel.abstract: Queue, used to deliver result completion blocks. Defaults to dispatch_get_main_queue().

Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC7sessionXev.name: session
Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC7sessionXev.abstract: Alamofire.Session instance used to send network requests

Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAACyXeXecfc.name: init(baseURL:buildingURL:session:plugins:)
Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAACyXeXecfc.abstract: Initializes TRON with given base URL, Alamofire.Session instance, and array of global plugins.

Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC7request_18.name: request(_:responseSerializer:)
Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC7request_18.abstract: Creates APIRequest with specified relative path and type RequestType.Default.

Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC6upload_10f.name: upload(_:fromFileAt:responseSerializer:)
Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC6upload_10f.abstract: Creates APIRequest with specified relative path and type RequestType.UploadFromFile.

Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC6upload_4da.name: upload(_:data:responseSerializer:)
Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC6upload_4da.abstract: Creates APIRequest with specified relative path and type RequestType.UploadData.

Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC6upload_4fr.name: upload(_:from:responseSerializer:)
Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC6upload_4fr.abstract: Creates APIRequest with specified relative path and type RequestType.UploadStream.

Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC8downloadyX.name: download(_:to:resumingFrom:responseSerializer:)
Classes/TRON.html#/s:4TRONAAC8downloadyX.abstract: Creates APIRequest with specified relative path and type RequestType.DownloadResuming.

Classes/NetworkLoggerPlugin.html#/s:4TRO.name: logCancelledRequests
Classes/NetworkLoggerPlugin.html#/s:4TRO.abstract: Log failures produced when request is cancelled. This property only works, if logFailures property is set to true.

Classes/NetworkLoggerPlugin.html#/s:4TRO.name: didSuccessfullyParseResponse(_:creating:forRequest:formedFrom:)
Classes/NetworkLoggerPlugin.html#/s:4TRO.abstract: Called, when response was successfully parsed. If logSuccess property has been turned on, prints cURL representation of request.

Classes/NetworkLoggerPlugin.html#/s:4TRO.name: didReceiveError(_:forResponse:request:formedFrom:)
Classes/NetworkLoggerPlugin.html#/s:4TRO.abstract: Called, when request received error. If logFailures has been turned on, prints cURL representation of request and helpful debugging information such as status code, HTTP body contents and error message. If logCancelledRequests property is turned to true, they are also printed.

Classes/NetworkActivityPlugin.html#/s:4T.name: didSendAlamofireRequest(_:formedFrom:)
Classes/NetworkActivityPlugin.html#/s:4T.abstract: Called when network request was sent, increases networkActivityCount by 1

Classes/NetworkActivityPlugin.html#/s:4T.name: willProcessResponse(response:forRequest:formedFrom:)
Classes/NetworkActivityPlugin.html#/s:4T.abstract: Called when response for request was received, decreases networkActivityCount by 1

Classes/DownloadAPIRequest.html#/s:4TRON.name: DownloadErrorParser
Classes/DownloadAPIRequest.html#/s:4TRON.abstract: Serializes received failed response into APIError object

Classes/DownloadAPIRequest.html#/s:4TRON.name: validationClosure
Classes/DownloadAPIRequest.html#/s:4TRON.abstract: Closure that is applied to request before it is sent.

Classes/DownloadAPIRequest.html#/s:4TRON.name: validation(_:)
Classes/DownloadAPIRequest.html#/s:4TRON.abstract: Sets validationClosure to validation parameter and returns configured request

Classes/DownloadAPIRequest.html#/s:4TRON.name: init(type:path:tron:responseSerializer:)
Classes/DownloadAPIRequest.html#/s:4TRON.abstract: Creates DownloadAPIRequest with specified type, path and configures it with to be used with tron.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.name: ErrorParser
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.abstract: Serializes received failed response into APIError object

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.name: headers
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.abstract: Headers, that should be used for current request. Defaults to HTTPHeaders.default

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.name: apiStub
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.abstract: API stub to be used when stubbing this request

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.name: interceptor
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.abstract: Request interceptor that allows to adapt and retry requests.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.name: resultDeliveryQueue
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.abstract: Queue, used to deliver result completion blocks. Defaults to TRON.resultDeliveryQueue queue.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.name: parameterEncoding(_:)
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.abstract: Sets parameterEncoding variable to encoding and returns configured request.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.name: headers(_:)
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.abstract: Sets headers variable to headers and returns configured request.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.name: usingPlugin(_:)
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.abstract: Appends plugin to plugins variable and returns configured request.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.name: buildURL(_:)
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.abstract: Replaces urlBuilder with URLBuilder with the same baseURL string and behavior.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.name: intercept(using:)
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.abstract: Sets per-request Interceptor for current request and returns.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.name: modifyRequest(_:)
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.abstract: Sets per-request modifier to configure URLRequest, that will be created.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.name: configure(_:)
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.abstract: Configures current given request by executing closure and returning.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.name: parameters(_:rootKey:)
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.abstract: Sets parameters into parameters variable on request. If rootKey is non-nil, parameters are wrapped in external dictionary and set into parameters using rootKey as a single key.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.name: optionalParameters(_:setNilToNull:rootKey:)
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.abstract: Sets parameters into parameters variable on request. If rootKey is non-nil, parameters are wrapped in external dictionary and set into parameters using rootKey as a single key.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.name: stub(with:delay:enabled:)
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:4TRON11BaseR.abstract: Sets stub into apiStub property, delay into apiStub.stubDelay property. Also enabled is set to apiStub.isEnabled property.

Classes/APIStub.html#/s:4TRON7APIStubC7r.name: request
Classes/APIStub.html#/s:4TRON7APIStubC7r.abstract: URLRequest object to use when request is being stubbed.

Classes/APIStub.html#/s:4TRON7APIStubC8r.name: response
Classes/APIStub.html#/s:4TRON7APIStubC8r.abstract: HTTPURLResponse to use when request is being stubbed.

Classes/APIStub.html#/s:4TRON7APIStubC4d.name: data
Classes/APIStub.html#/s:4TRON7APIStubC4d.abstract: Data to use when request is being stubbed. This property is ignored for DownloadAPIRequest.

Classes/APIStub.html#/s:4TRON7APIStubC5e.name: error
Classes/APIStub.html#/s:4TRON7APIStubC5e.abstract: Error to use when request is being stubbed.

Classes/APIStub.html#/s:4TRON7APIStubC7f.name: fileURL
Classes/APIStub.html#/s:4TRON7APIStubC7f.abstract: File URL to use when stubbing DownloadAPIRequest. This property is ignored for APIRequest and UploadAPIRequest.

Classes/APIStub.html#/s:4TRON7APIStubC9i.name: isEnabled
Classes/APIStub.html#/s:4TRON7APIStubC9i.abstract: When this property is set to true, stub will be activated. Defaults to false.

Classes/APIRequest.html#/s:4TRON10APIReq.name: validationClosure
Classes/APIRequest.html#/s:4TRON10APIReq.abstract: Closure that is applied to request before it is sent. Defaults to { $0.validate() }

Classes/APIRequest.html#/s:4TRON10APIReq.name: validation(_:)
Classes/APIRequest.html#/s:4TRON10APIReq.abstract: Sets validationClosure to validation parameter and returns configured request

Classes/APIError.html#/s:4TRON8APIErrorC.name: data
Classes/APIError.html#/s:4TRON8APIErrorC.abstract: Data, contained in response. Nil, if this error is coming from a download request.

Classes/APIError.html#/s:4TRON8APIErrorC.name: fileURL
Classes/APIError.html#/s:4TRON8APIErrorC.abstract: Downloaded fileURL. Nil, if used with upload or data requests.

Classes/APIError.html#/s:4TRON8APIErrorC.name: error
Classes/APIError.html#/s:4TRON8APIErrorC.abstract: Error instance, created by Foundation Loading System or Alamofire.

Classes/APIError.html#/s:4TRON8APIErrorC.name: isCancelled
Classes/APIError.html#/s:4TRON8APIErrorC.abstract: Whether the request, that led to this error, was cancelled by the sender

Classes/APIError.html.name: APIError
Classes/APIError.html.abstract: APIError is used as a generic wrapper for all kinds of API errors.

Classes/APIRequest.html.name: APIRequest
Classes/APIRequest.html.abstract: APIRequest encapsulates request creation logic, stubbing options, and response/error parsing.

Classes/APIStub.html.name: APIStub
Classes/APIStub.html.abstract: APIStub instance that is used to represent stubbed response. Any properties of this class is presented to serialization classes as if they would be received by URL loading system.

Classes/BaseRequest.html.name: BaseRequest
Classes/BaseRequest.html.abstract: Base class, that contains common functionality, extracted from APIRequest and MultipartAPIRequest.

Classes/DownloadAPIRequest.html.name: DownloadAPIRequest
Classes/DownloadAPIRequest.html.abstract: DownloadAPIRequest encapsulates download request creation logic, stubbing options, and response/error parsing.

Classes/NetworkLoggerPlugin.html.name: NetworkLoggerPlugin
Classes/NetworkLoggerPlugin.html.abstract: Plugin, that can be used to log network success and failure responses.

Classes/TRON.html.name: TRON
Classes/TRON.html.abstract: TRON is a root object, that serves as a provider for single API endpoint. It is used to create and configure instances of APIRequest and MultipartAPIRequest.

Classes/CodableParser.html.name: CodableParser
Classes/CodableParser.html.abstract: CodableParser is a wrapper around modelDecoder and errorDecoder JSONDecoders to be used when decoding JSON response.

Classes/CodableSerializer.html.name: CodableSerializer
Classes/CodableSerializer.html.abstract: Serializer for objects, that conform to Decodable protocol.

Classes/URLBuilder.html.name: URLBuilder
Classes/URLBuilder.html.abstract: URLBuilder constructs resulting URL by calling URLByAppendingPathComponent method on baseURL.

Classes/UploadAPIRequest.html.name: UploadAPIRequest
Classes/UploadAPIRequest.html.abstract: UploadAPIRequest encapsulates upload request creation logic, stubbing options, and response/error parsing.
